DOC.brief_title: Treatment Chronic Antibody-mediated Rejection Kidney Transplant With Acthar
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive Acthar® 40 unit twice week subcutaneously 2 week . If drug well tolerate dose increase 80 unit twice week another 22 week . The patient maintain center-specific standard maintenance regimen , typically consist Tacrolimus , mycephenolate mofetil/Sodium , prednisone . After screen inclusion/exclusion criterion , patient consent enrolled study . The initial visit subsequent study-related visit 4 , 8 , 12 , 24 , 36 52 week include routine evaluation physical examination laboratory study include CBC , electrolyte panel , eGFR , albumin , liver enzymes , CNI/sirulimus drug level , accord center 's standard care . DSA test week 24 , 52 patient undergo biopsy week 52 , part investigator standard care . The biopsy evaluate light electron microscopy use standard histological Banff criterion , stain CD68 .
